name: TileCount
description:
Count your way to the victory.

What is it?

- It is a strategy game based on your logic, ability to think several turns ahead and memorization.

Evade powered tiles

How to play this?

- Start the game, select board size and use WASD or arrow keys to move your number (marked in green). Every time you move, your power increases by one. You can only move to tiles that have a power less than yours. When you move out of the tile, its power is changed based on amount of times you've been on a tile before.

The winner is the last loser.

How to win?

- There's no winner. A person who gets the best score before getting trapped is considered to be the winner. The person with the best strategy wins!
